"A.P.238/4/9/11:30":
"...I was surprised by how reliable
you've become since we last met."
"...Until recently you had an unreliable feeling, but now you seem like a career ARKS."
"...You've grown a lot in such a short time. I can hardly believe it."
"Hahahaha! Hey there, participants! I hope you're enjoying yourselves!"
"Huey, Huey! I want to take part too! Let me join in!"
"You're part of the staff... Ahem... time to report the current standing!"
"...Right now, the pair in the lead is the Hunter Ohza and the Ranger Jean."
"But it seems like the pair of Marlu and <%me> are also working hard!"
"Oh, I think I've heard that name before..."
"Nonetheless, it's neck-and-neck! The ARKS Battle Championship is a fierce struggle! The tide could turn at any moment!"
"Hey, Huey. Aren't you just reading from your notes? How's that fun?"
"The second half of the game begins here, so we expect you to do your best! That's all!"
"Look here, Claris Claes, this is about the participants, so can you please read it properly in future?"
"...That person's beating us. <%me>. Let's do our best in the second half."
